abstract: Johnson & Johnson’s hopes for an early return on its acquisition of Conor Medsystems were dashed by the failure of Conor’s heart stent design in a medical trial.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson’s hopes for an early return on its acquisition of Conor Medsystems were dashed by the failure of Conor’s heart stent design in a medical trial.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson’s hopes for an early return on its recent $1.4 billion acquisition of Conor Medsystems have been dashed by the failure of Conor’s heart stent design in a pivotal medical trial comparing it with a Boston Scientific stent.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Won’t Seek Approval for a Heart Stent
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Won’t Seek Approval for a Heart Stent
